description: Angular component for managing automation rules, including creating, displaying, toggling activation, and deleting rules.

classes.name: AutomationComponent
classes.description: Angular component class for automation rules management, implementing OnInit lifecycle hook.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component and loads existing rules.

methods.name: onTriggerTypeChange
methods.description: Handles change in trigger type and updates the form state accordingly.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of automation rules from the API.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the form to its initial state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new automation rule using the form data.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the active state of a rule.
